divs: Sighting DetailsI was on front of my house, that is facing east. And I first saw two of this red-orange lights comming from the south side,on my right side up on the sky flying one next to the other one and no noise at all, and when they were exactly on front of my house up on the sky they desapear, and then again two more red-orange and then it was a line up of 5 or more following the same pattern and flying at the same speed, the same distance in between and the same thing happens they desapear.
Summary: more than 10 bright orange sphere like objects flying north
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bellport
There were no other sightings in Bellport on or around September 13th 2012
